name: Terror T.R.A.X.: Track of the Vampire
name_original: Terror T.R.A.X.: Track of the Vampire
description:
Terror T.R.A.X.: Track of the Vampire is an adventure game. It came out on 01-01-1995. It was published by Grolier Electronic Publishing. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Terror T.R.A.X.: Track of the Vampire is available on PC.
